title: HOUR 3: Ric Bucher
itunes:title: HOUR 3: Ric Bucher
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Jason McIntyre weigh in on Thom Brenneman's awkward and apology and make their predictions for tonight in the NBA. Plus, they sepeak with FS1 NBA analyst Ric Bucher about which playoff favorite needs to be the most concerned!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
